title: Dance Dance Revolution
description:
Updates
Well my previous release included DWI and all the song files in a .rar file. Now Iv&#039;e packed it into an installer and 
included more songs. I also switched from DWI to StepMania. It may take a little while longer to load but it has more 
of that DDr feel and more options. Please check back as I believe in September 2008 DDRX comes out and i&#039;ll have the 
dance files as soon as I can get them. I covered basics but there are many custom dance files out there.

For more simulator files (tracks) visit:
www.bemanistyle.com
www.stepmania.com

For more Themes, Noteskins, characters, and Announcers visit:
www.stepmaniathings.com

Thanks to...
www.ddruk.com
www.bemanistyle.com
www.stepmania.com

Check out http://www.mymybox.com/ for dance pads for all platforms.
Check out http://www.flashflashrevolution.com/ for online flash version of DDR.

Instructions:
Install StepMania-3.9
Extract Songs.rar to :/Program Files/StepMania/Songs
Place contents of Courses to :/Program Files/StepMania/Courses and run each smzip file to install
Place contents of Themes to :/Program Files/StepMania/Themes and run each smzip file to install
Play
